text: Building a future where technology <breakpoint><umn_gold>serves<breakpoint>, data <breakpoint><umn_gold>guides<breakpoint>, and humans <breakpoint><umn_gold>lead the way<breakpoint>.

We turn complex data and automation into systems that <breakpoint><umn-gold>sharpen<breakpoint> decisions, <breakpoint><umn-gold>elevate<breakpoint> performance and <breakpoint><umn-gold>unlock<breakpoint> potential.

Every project is tailored with <breakpoint><umn-gold>precision<breakpoint> and driven by <breakpoint><umn-gold>purpose<breakpoint>, solving <breakpoint><umn-gold>challenges that matter<breakpoint> and creating <breakpoint><umn-gold>futures that last<breakpoint>.

items: Weak internal trust & lack of decision-making clarity

team.title: The Mind Behind UMN
text: Our strength is hUMaN. We are a collective of strategists, scientists, and creators bound by a single conviction: <umn-gold>technology should serve people, not replace them.
Led by Gil Gaspar, whose vision unites data mastery with human insight, we embrace only challenges that demand precision, creativity, and absolute discretion.</umn-gold>

cta: We donâ€™t seek clients. We seek <umn-gold>visionary partners.</umn-gold>
